AverageCharWidth.summary: Use a supplied text and control font.
AverageCharWidth.returns: The average character width for the specified text.

AverageCharWidth1.summary: Use text consisting of possible characters (A-Z) or (a-z).
AverageCharWidth1.returns: The Average character width for the specified textLength.

GetSelectedDate.summary: Display the Calendar control to select a date.

TextUnitWidth.summary: The text length in page units.
TextUnitWidth.returns: The text width in page units.

TextUnitWidth1.summary: Use text consisting of possible characters (A-Z) or (a-z).
TextUnitWidth1.returns: The textLength width in page units.
